title: Dakota Johnson dresses for fall as she steps out with sister Grace for matcha in West Hollywood
text:
Dakota Johnson is officially another decade older, having celebrated her 30th birthday over the weekend.

After a star-studded birthday bash, she seems to be enjoying some quality family time.

The actress dressed for sweater weather Tuesday as she stepped out with little sister Grace for matcha in West Hollywood.

Sister bonding: Dakota Johnson dressed for sweater weather Tuesday as she stepped out with little sister Grace for matcha in West Hollywood

Dakota donned a thin grey t-shirt with a black sweater tied loosely over her shoulders.

She wore the shirt tucked into a pair of black slim high-waisted pants with round toirtoseshell sunglasses and a pair of grey sneakers with orange and green soles.

The Peanut Butter Falcon star celebrated her birthday Saturday with a lavish party in Malibu.

The star-studded guest list included boyfriend Chris Martin, his ex-wife Gywneth Platrow, Miley Cyrus, Kate Hudson and Tatiana Maslany.

Sweater weather: She donned a thin grey t-shirt with a black sweater tied loosely over her shoulders

Paltrow took to Instagram to wish her pal a happy birthday, posting a black-and-white photo of the birthday girl.

The Politician actress wrote in the caption: 'Happy 30th birthday to this absolute gem.'

Mom Melanie Griffith also posted a birthday tribute, sharing a childhood photo of her daughter.

30 and flirty and thriving: The Peanut Butter Falcon star celebrated her 30th birthday Saturday with a lavish party in Malibu

Happy birthday! Gwyneth Paltrow took to Instagram to wish her pal a happy birthday, posting a black-and-white photo of the birthday girl: 'Happy 30th birthday to this absolute gem'

Mama's girl: Mom Melanie Griffith also posted a birthday tribute, sharing a childhood photo of her daughter: 'My Coqui... Happy Birthday my beautiful girl! I am honored to be your Mama. So so proud of you! I love you with all of my heart!'

She wrote: 'My Coqui... Happy Birthday my beautiful girl! I am honored to be your Mama. So so proud of you! I love you with all of my heart!'

And although she's a full grown woman, dad Don Johnson revealed he still can't watch his baby girl in her breakout film Fifty Shades of Grey.

When asked if he saw the film on This Morning, he responded: 'Hmmmm image control! There are certain images as a father you don’t really need to see.'
description: Johnson celebrated her birthday Saturday with a lavish party in Malibu. The star-studded guest list included boyfriend Chris Martin, his ex-wife Gywneth Platrow, Miley Cyrus and Kate Hudson.
